name: Overview
description: Dive into the fundamentals of healthcare by exploring key treatment modalities and principles. Learn how Club Health strips back the saturated world of healthcare to focus on evidence-based physiotherapy, rehab & conditioning, and clinical pilates—all designed to help patients move well and prevent musculoskeletal conditions.

name: What you'll learn
points: We added an option in the form builder to create and update custom reference forms.
A new setting in the job posting section lets you specify if references are needed for the job.
When reference collection is enabled, an extra block shows up in the job application form to collect references.
Both applicants and staff can see the reference status in the job application detail view, with options to view details or send reminders.
Once a reference form is completed, staff can review the submitted information.

name: Who should enroll
points: Physiotherapists seeking advanced clinical reasoning skills.
Fitness trainers aiming to prevent client injuries.
Rehab professionals expanding their toolkit with clinical Pilates.
Healthcare practitioners focused on sustainable patient outcomes.

courseOutline.name: Introduction & Philosophy
courseOutline.description: Understand Club Health’s approach, founded on “Moving Well, and Moving Often.”

courseOutline.name: Physiotherapy Fundamentals
courseOutline.description: Assessment techniques, evidence-based practice, and treatment planning.

courseOutline.name: Treatment Techniques
courseOutline.description: Hands-on approaches including soft tissue manipulation, joint mobilisation, and percussion therapy.

courseOutline.name: Specialized Therapies
courseOutline.description: Explore trigger point therapy, laser therapy, and acupuncture.

courseOutline.name: Prevention & Maintenance
courseOutline.description: Learn strategies for rehab, conditioning, and long-term wellness through exercise selection and clinical pilates.

courseOutline.name: Summary & Integration
courseOutline.description: Recap and integrate concepts to support sustainable wellness.
